headline: Cloud AI Today - AI Trends Shaping Strategic Business Approaches For 2026
summary: Recent findings from a survey conducted by the Ramsey Theory Group highlight three pivotal trends in artificial intelligence (AI) that will define enterprise strategies in 2026. As AI moves from experimental phases to becoming a fundamental component of business operations, organizations are focusing on agentic AI systems with controlled autonomy, robust AI cost management, and dynamic governance models. These developments reflect a mature AI market where accountability, transparency, and...

headline: Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT) Stock Price Prediction for 2025: Where Will It Be in 1 Year
summary: Shares of Microsoft (NASDAQ:MSFT) gained 1.96% over the past five trading sessions after losing 0.03% the five prior. That brings MSFT’s year-to-date gain to 16.59%, including a nearly 38% gain since its year-to-date low on April 8. When the Magnificent Seven member reported FY 2026 Q1 earnings on Oct. 29, 2025, shares fell despite beating ... Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT) Stock Price Prediction for 2025: Where Will It Be in 1 Year

headline: Private credit risks: What to make of Oracle's debt, AI trade
summary: TPW Advisory founder Jay Pelosky and Whalen Global Advisors founder and chairman Chris Whalen come on Market Catalysts to discuss the credit risks materializing in the AI trade and Magnificent Seven tech names, most notably Oracle's (ORCL) growing debt amid concerns of an AI bubble risk. Also catch Jay Pelosky and Chris Whalen share their insights into the banking sector heading into 2026, the next phase in the commodities super cycle, and forecasts on non-US equities. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
